Name: Name Change, Rabbi Yaakov Spiegel Way, Manhattan
Title: A Local Law in relation to a street name, Rabbi Yaakov Spiegel Way, Borough of Manhattan.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New NamePresent NameLimitsRabbi Yaakov Spiegel WayRivington Streetbetween Ludlow Street and Orchard Street
	ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately upon its enactment law.
